title: Wireless charging with Anker PowerPort stops charging at 70%
content:
I've been using an Anker PowerPort to wirelessly charge my Pixel 3 XL for 8 months or so. In the past few weeks, the charging seems to stop at around 70%. The phone shows it's "wirelessly charging" but it doesn't get to full battery. 

Does anyone else have this issue? Is there something wrong with my phone? The charger?

Thanks!
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
